summary: First uploaded mod :3 It adds a few basic skills such as Monk which increases unarmed combat by 10 points each rank.
descriptionHtml:
Here\'s a list of perks so far:

Monk (5 teirs)- Increases unarmed combat by 10 points per rank. (Light Armor)

Meditation (3 teirs)- Increases stamina regeneration. (Light Armor)

Snakebite (2 teirs)- Increases movement speed (Sneak)

Predator\'s Grace (replaces Shadow Warrior) When sneaking player turns invisible. (Sneak)

I\'d love to receive comments and suggestions, I know some of them seem a bit overpowered but I\'ll do a bit of tweaking on them, any perks you\'d like to implement suggest them to me, I\'ll see if i can do it.

INSTALLATION

Use NMM or download, plug them into your skyrim data folder, fire up skyrim and make sure the file is ticked. Have fun!
author: Sharmanix
